item.description: The new stockpile plans are compared the the 50-year-old Strategic Petroleum Reserve, created in response to the 1973 Arab oil embargo.

item.title: Moltbook is scary—but not for the reasons so many headlines said
item.description: It is people's devil-may-care attitude to the risk of AI agents that ought to really frighten us
